titles.title: MP405 Let it be to me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let it be to me
According to your word.
Let it be to me
According to your word.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am your servant,
No rights shall I demand.
Let it be to me,
Let it be to me,
Let it be to me
According to your word.
(Repeat)
